42c027e4ff9730fbb3de84c1af0d2c506e41c3e4: Daniel Radcliffe turns 18 and gains access to a reported £20 million fortune. He insists the money won't cast a spell on him. Despite his growing fame and riches, Radcliffe says he is keeping his feet firmly on the ground.
ee8871b15c50d0db17b0179a6d2beab35065f1e9: CNN correspondent Soledad O'Brien shares experiences covering mentally ill inmates in Miami. Many mentally ill inmates are housed in Miami before trial. Judge Steven Leifman advocates for justice and better treatment for the mentally ill. He works to change the system and provide long-term treatment.
06352019a19ae31e527f37f7571c6dd7f0c5da37: Minneapolis bridge collapse survivors recount harrowing tales of escape and rescue efforts. Emergency room physician and volunteers work to aid injured victims. Survivors describe chaotic and surreal experiences during the collapse.
24521a2abb2e1f5e34e6824e0f9e56904a2b0e88: President Bush had five small polyps removed from his colon. Results are expected in two to three days. The president is in good humor and will resume his activities. Cheney assumed presidential power during the procedure.
7fe70cc8b12fab2d0a258fababf7d9c6b5e1262a: NFL suspends Michael Vick indefinitely without pay for involvement in dogfighting ring. Vick set to appear in court Monday for plea deal. Vick admits to participating in dogfighting ring and killing dogs in plea agreement. Falcons owner calls Vick's actions "incomprehensible and unacceptable."
a1ebb8bb4d370a1fdf28769206d572be60642d70: 5-year-old Youssif, a burn victim from Iraq, receives global support for medical treatment. The Children's Burn Foundation in California offers to cover all medical costs for Youssif's treatment in the United States. Youssif's parents express gratitude for the outpouring of support and hope for their son's recovery.
7c0e61ac829a3b3b653e2e3e7536cc4881d1f264: Iraqi women turn to prostitution to survive due to violence and lack of government aid. They feel forced to sell their bodies to provide for their children. Humanitarian workers are trying to help these women and bring attention to their plight.
f0d73bdab711763e745cdc75850861c9018f235d: Key FARC rebel commander "El Negro Acacio" killed in Colombian military air attack. He was involved in managing the group's extensive cocaine trafficking network. The army's Rapid Response Force tracked him down at a FARC camp in the jungle. FARC is Colombia's oldest, largest, most capable and best-equipped Marxist rebel group.
5e22bbfc7232418b8d2dd646b952e404df5bd048: White House press secretary Tony Snow will step down from his post on September 14. President Bush expressed warmth and support for Snow's departure. Snow cited financial reasons for leaving, expressing gratitude for his time in the role.
613d6311ec2c1985bd44707d1796d275452fe156:
Empty rocket launcher tube found on Jersey City lawn.
Launcher turned over to U.S. Army officials.
Investigation underway by FBI and Jersey City police.
017d27d00eb43678c15cb4a8dd4723a035323219:
President Bush invokes Vietnam War lessons to argue against pulling out of Iraq.
He also compares Vietnam withdrawal to emboldening terrorists and seeks to reframe the Iraq debate.
The White House's efforts come as public support for the war continues to decline.
85f55a3e0dd672857aaaaa80954934a57b7a2fbf:
- Chronology of bombings and attempted bomb attacks in the UK since the 1970s.
- Various incidents including IRA attacks and Al Qaeda bombings.
- Police defuse a bomb in London's theater district and disrupt a plot by Islamic militants.
77d7c8cf2a9432e395d629371a12790c563c19f7: Carlos Alberto joins Werder Bremen for a club record fee. He aims to win titles with his new club. Bundesliga attracts top Brazilian players in recent days.
35f0e33de7923036a97ac245d899f990bda5e242: Vice President Cheney to serve as acting president during Bush's colonoscopy. Procedure to be conducted at Camp David. Colonoscopy is the most sensitive test for colon cancer. American Cancer Society recommends screening at age 50.
2ad31cae96512af5105b9b23f9b681dc732b2605: A magnitude 4.2 earthquake shook the San Francisco area. About 2,000 customers were left without power. The quake was considered "light" and caused minimal damage. The quake was centered about two miles east-northeast of Oakland.
0d43b97000ff852282c89d8d105e41495c0ee9bd: Officials have given up hope of finding six trapped miners alive in a Utah coal mine. The rescue operation has been called off after exhausting all options. The families of the miners are devastated by the tragic outcome.
bf0cd4ccacd4fe045995338f4c44d9cf18000226:
- Bomb blast in Batna, Algeria kills 14, injures 60
- Explosion occurred near mosque before president's arrival
- No immediate claim of responsibility
2f43e9dfaa43ffbddbce339a8b6403ddce43b38a: David Beckham joins U.S. Major League Soccer with Los Angeles Galaxy. CNN explores Beckham's rise to stardom and life in Hollywood. Beckham's impact on U.S. soccer and life in Los Angeles is examined.
eb68bc51ed4fc727a1af058192a3fef0916c91e7:
Australian honey bees may be linked to collapse of US honey bee colonies.
Colony collapse disorder imperils crops dependent on bees for pollination.
Researchers caution that collapse disorder is likely caused by several factors.
ad021a7924ee57491cee8576499ac196b1afeb23: Customers line up to withdraw cash from UK mortgage bank Northern Rock after bailout. Bank reassures customers, but fears of global credit crunch persist. Shares in Northern Rock drop, prompting reassurances from bank and government. Bank insists it is sound and safe, while government aims to stabilize banking system.
9d7fc7fd9ffbfecb1c458b9929fa02e6c3538368: O.J. Simpson held without bail after arrest on robbery and assault charges in Las Vegas. Police believe Simpson directed armed robbery of sports memorabilia. Investigators seeking four other men believed to have accompanied Simpson into the hotel room.
30cb674030b01014d2c87b92f09152857e249631: Nigeria's TV survival show suspended after contestant drowns in preparation. Show sponsored by Dutch brewer Heineken's local unit. Contestant drowned in preparation for "Gulder Ultimate Search."
d41dc7fc05273a37f0aceaf4f3e35a187f12653e: Former government contract employee indicted for stealing nuclear materials and putting US at risk. Materials taken from East Tennessee Technology Park. Alleged plot to divulge materials uncovered by authorities.
fbc6a4d0697b2a3e8b549dcb1f80a8ce7bf47e34:
Chelsea waits on John Terry's fitness for Champions League match with Valencia.
Frank Lampard ruled out due to injury, while Michael Essien expected to play.
Terry tries protective mask after broken cheekbone, manager to decide on availability.
Grant confirms Lampard's absence, Essien battles injury but expected to participate.
0753a471e6908c35bcbc2daa37e21f3a8443b590:
Global organ trafficking and black market trade exploits the poor and desperate.
Rich countries' organ shortage drives foreigners to buy organs from poorer countries.
The trade raises ethical and legal concerns, with calls for regulation and transparency.
08450c1bc03472825196be1acb02ac0e13bef939: Hollywood filmmakers are considering whether to insure Lindsay Lohan for future movies. Underwriting experts say no actor is uninsurable, but covering problematic stars comes with high costs. Insurance rates for errant actors can range from 1 percent to 3 percent of a movie's production budget.
7fa8d9beca50155fd3d71a9087a4311ce321c34b: Francesco Totti threatens to quit Italian Players Association over Serie A season start date. Totti complains that Italian players are never listened to. Italian Football League's decision to start the season on August 26 sparks controversy. Serie A is one of the last major European leagues to start next season.
414a5b8ecbe189d2767c75b839775a1dcafaf4d3:
- Federal prosecutors are investigating allegations of illegal weapons purchases and sales by Blackwater employees in Iraq.
- The investigation focuses on individual company employees, not the firm itself.
- Blackwater asserts that allegations of unlawful arms activities are baseless, and the company has resumed normal security operations in Iraq.
cac7a712935380d74410a7cba8d406235d51249a:
5-year-old burned Iraqi boy meets favorite superhero, Spider-Man, at Universal Studios.
Meeting Spider-Man was "my favorite thing," says Youssif.
The day at Universal Studios was a day of dreams for Youssif and his family.
Youssif's family describes life of chaos in Baghdad, finds peace and generosity in America.
e9093ca0a82f2aba28cd2762942c04177cfbb000:
Marine convicted in Iraqi civilian death receives reduction in rank and discharge.
Cpl. Trent D. Thomas demoted to entry-level private and receives bad-conduct discharge.
Thomas among seven Marines and a Navy medic charged in connection with the death.
Sgt. Lawrence G. Hutchins III pleads not guilty to murder and conspiracy charges in the case.
55a6aabd120f0b18297f7efe22452f9b3aca0d8d: Prince Harry pays tribute to Princess Diana on the 10th anniversary of her death. He describes her as "the best mother in the world" in a speech at a memorial service. Princess Diana is remembered for her public work and her impact on people's lives. The Bishop of London also speaks about Princess Diana's public work and her legacy.
06bc2f0272d033b123e9eebbb221c62d7d51c283: French Foreign Minister Bernard Kouchner challenges convention and authority. He has a strong commitment to human rights. Kouchner's statements reflect France's new high-profile style under President Nicolas Sarkozy.
17e43e8e7d2bbbb237df78537d108c3fa917d9fb:
- Beethoven's "Für Elise" likely not written for anyone named Elise.
- Elton John's "Philadelphia Freedom" inspired by Billie Jean King.
- The Kinks' "Lola" inspired by a transvestite, with conflicting stories about its origin.
- "867-5309/Jenny" by Tommy Tutone has a real phone number causing havoc.
ddcdeb9bdd19fa23f9495c85d48eeee910f33102:
- Historic spending expected for political and issue-advocacy advertising in the 2008 election cycle.
- Former Massachusetts Gov. Mitt Romney leads TV advertising spending among presidential contenders.
- Estimated cost to influence the 2008 election could exceed $3 billion.
- Candidates and interest groups turning to TV ads to reach voters, with significant spending predicted.
ee0ba7928d8987f2cb21c9a2012a76730f77de45: Relatives arrive in Phuket to identify crash victims. Many foreign nationals among the victims. Investigation into crash continues, weather conditions suspected as a factor. U.S. officials aiding in investigation due to aircraft's origin.
554fd99f28ae12472c5d99ef6383bb184744c25a: Michael Moore and CNN's Sanjay Gupta argued about Gupta's report on Moore's film "Sicko." Both agreed on the problems in America's health-care system. Gupta expressed concern about the portrayal of universal health care in the film. Moore criticized the current health care system and suggested putting health care in the hands of the government.
9e141ebc1c06d483bf85f4e5c8b3c7bc2d00ea2f: Some Democrats are wavering on a House resolution labeling Turkey's treatment of Armenians as genocide. Turkey, a U.S. ally, was incensed by the resolution and threatened to block access to Incirlik Air Base. The Pentagon is preparing new supply routes for troops in Iraq if Turkey cuts off U.S. access to Incirlik. Democratic leaders are reconsidering the resolution after opposition from some lawmakers and concerns about military logistics.
c9160e2f5ce386dabb10517e7a5c0933c01a9546: Twelve-year-old Mohammed Rasoul, who lost his leg in Iraq, is going to the United States for medical treatment. An American charity is helping Mohammed receive surgery and treatment in the US. Mohammed hopes to rebuild Falluja and continue his education after his treatment.
d256aee1a47eb5b489dee6fb72ab7f7d1483a37f: India elects its first female president, Pratibha Patil, amid controversy and support for women's rights. Patil easily beat opposition-backed challenger Bhairon Singh Shekhawat in the vote. Supporters hope her presidency will bring attention to issues plaguing women in India.
2fff2bc541ef34a6647dfa2e4294cdcc187e47b9:
- More than 100 homes evacuated after San Diego landslide.
- Mayor declares state of emergency, seeks aid from California and federal government.
- Officials warned of ground shifting in the area for at least two weeks.
677375a4c69e81ab623af7c06a6b0a8d03d6350e: French charity's attempt to take children from Chad for adoption sparks international controversy. Aid agencies report most of the children are neither Sudanese nor orphans. Chadian authorities accuse the charity of kidnapping and concealing the children's identities. French authorities react angrily to the charity's actions, calling them "illegal and irresponsible."
33530f97118cc905b05cb920671492c7bfdf3a3b:
Explorer discovers island near Greenland, believes it's a result of climate change.
Debate over global warming's causes and implications.
Scientists express concern over potential catastrophic effects of global warming.
3c19a753303ae0d67b3ae28e070c0f4157ffc52d: Crowd drags Ethiopian soldier's body through Somalia's streets after gun battles with insurgents. Fighting drives hundreds from their homes, adding to the tens of thousands who have fled. Ethiopian troops arrived in Somalia in 2006 to help the government drive out the Islamic Courts Union.
9313988d26672c576f08e130c895edf20d8aa626: Police sergeant's wife disappearance treated as potential homicide, husband a suspect. Judge orders exhumation of Drew Peterson's third wife's body. Investigation raises questions about death of Peterson's third wife, Kathleen Savio. Friends and family express concerns about Stacy Peterson's relationship with her husband.
72f4a6670ec7ec915c83d58bb0ebf152b1605bb6: Julia Vakulenko will face Lindsay Davenport in her first WTA Tour final. Vakulenko seeks her first victory on the WTA Tour at the Bell Challenge in Quebec. Davenport is seeking her second win in three tournaments since returning from a one-year hiatus.
b73f50e29d5b2943eb315643bef8ee4e09f5605b: Pakistani President Pervez Musharraf declares state of emergency and takes controversial actions. International condemnation and domestic unrest follow Musharraf's actions. The situation in Pakistan remains tense and uncertain as the crisis unfolds. Musharraf's actions prompt criticism and concern from both domestic and international sources.
f9689fb9656132e1c6d186851563f2b968643791: Chief operating officer of National Children's Museum arrested for distributing child pornography. Museum officials "horrified" by news, Singer suspended from post. Singer faces up to 140 years in prison if convicted on each count.
63831b842812b1a3d05b04904a10d160fe7ad2af: Chester Arthur Stiles appears in court on charges related to the rape of a 2-year-old girl. The girl's mother expresses relief at Stiles' arrest and discusses the impact on her family. Former girlfriends of Stiles also share their experiences and reactions to the case.
05688bac0e46542be65a6df240428a6f26c86fd0: South African bowler Dale Steyn took a career-best five for 34 in the first test against New Zealand. South Africa's strong performance led to a lead of 287 runs. New Zealand struggled in their reply, with their former captain Stephen Fleming being injured by Steyn.
5ba0d22ccba29ac8a3c77da069165d6016f5a214:
- Enjoy summer with hammock lounging, firefly catching, beach running, and more.
- Tips for cutting jeans into shorts, catching fireflies, running on the beach, and more.
